events.message: I just received my order, but the device has a large scratch on the screen and it appears to be faulty.
The issue was categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of damage and faultiness.
The case was assigned to agent Maria S. for further handling of the reported product defect.
Hello! I’m Maria from support. I’m sorry to hear your device arrived damaged. I’m here to help.
Could you please send us photos of the scratch and any other defects you noticed on the device?
I’ve attached several images showing the scratch on the screen and a crack near the corner. It’s really disappointing.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement device or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to go with the replacement option. Please tell me how to proceed with the exchange process.
We have initiated the replacement order and arranged for a courier to pick up the damaged device within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your replacement device and if everything is working perfectly now.
We are closing this case now. If you have any further issues, please don’t hesitate to contact us again. Thank you!
